headline.main: GREAT NECK BEATS TEXAS AT POLO, 10-5; Iglehart's Team Gains Second Meadow League Victory-- Hurricanes Top Delhi AKNUSTI HALTS PELICANS Bostwick Field Turns Back Long Island by 10-3 in Brook League Contest

lead_paragraph: WESTBURY, L.I., June 30-- Stewart Iglehart and Cecil Smith, ten-goal players who will captain the teams in the Red Cross benefit match on July 14, came together on Cochran Field of the Meadow Brook Club today, Great Neck, led by Iglehart, scored a surprising 10-to-5 victory over Texas.
